last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 12
last_episode_to_air.overview: Ji-hun vows revenge with the help of the law. He provokes Cha Min-chul into exposing the dark secrets.

name: One Dollar Lawyer
overview: Courts are not equally accessible to everyone and people lose trust in the judicial system. But here comes a lawyer with the best skills and a commission fee of just one dollar, committed to social justice and defending fundamental human rights. This extraordinary defense lawyer confronts blindfolded justice and highly paid opposing counsel for his clients' rights.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Ji-hun represents a defendant who pleads not guilty. A court battle with prosecutor Baek Ma-ri begins.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Assistant attorney Ma-ri joins Ji-hun's team. They have a new client.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Ma-ri defends Ji-hun, who makes a big deal out of a simple case. Ji-hun has a secret talk in prison.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Ji-hun takes on a parricide case. He must prove that defendant's father is alive to assert innocence.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Ji-hun searches the missing painter's house. He sees a secret meeting and finds crucial evidence.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Ma-ri gets curious about Ju-yeong and listens to Ji-hun's past as a zealous prosecutor.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Prosecutor Ji-hun meets Ju-yeong while investigating a slush fund case.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Ji-hun despairs after witnessing a death. Ju-yeong comforts him and their relationship develops.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: Ji-hun and Ma-ri set out to help Sa Mu-jang, who gets scammed by his car dealer.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: A mysterious man visits Ji-hun's office. Meanwhile, Min-hyeok has doubts about Kim Sung-wook's death.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: Ji-hun continues to hunt down Cha Min-chul. Unavoidable fate meets them.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: Ji-hun vows revenge with the help of the law. He provokes Cha Min-chul into exposing the dark secrets.
